step_feedback.feedback: Good job maintaining a relatively consistent posture throughout the inhalation phase. Remember to visualize the fluid moving towards your chest as you inhale.
You effectively placed your hands on your abdomen.  Focus on maintaining a comfortable and stable position to optimize breathing.
While the inhalation technique shows improvement, ensure whole-body muscle tightening is consistent throughout the inhalation.  Visualizing fluid movement will help.
The relaxation during exhalation needs more focus.  Concentrate on fully relaxing your muscles and visualizing the fluid being pushed out.  Try a slower, more controlled exhale.

exercise_summary: The patient demonstrated good posture and hand placement during the exercise.  Inhalations showed improvement, but maintaining consistent whole-body muscle engagement needs further attention.  Exhalations require more focus on complete muscle relaxation and visualization of fluid expulsion.  The exercise could benefit from slower, more controlled breathing.
